name: astra
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Astra DB cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`astra` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/datastax/terraform-provider-astra).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Astra DB cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/datastax/terraform-provider-astra)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi/pulumi-astra` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-astra/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`datastax/terraform-provider-astra` repo](https://github.com/datastax/terraform-provider-astra/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the astra package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

addresses.description: List of address requests that should have access to database endpoints.

databaseId.description: The ID of the Astra database.

enabled.description: Public access restrictions enabled or disabled

enabled.description: Public access restrictions enabled or disabled

databaseId.description: The ID of the Astra database.

enabled.description: Public access restrictions enabled or disabled

astra:index/cdc:Cdc.description:
`astra.Cdc` enables cdc for an Astra Serverless table.


## Import



```sh
 $ pulumi import astra:index/cdc:Cdc example databaseId/keyspace/table/tenantName
```

databaseId.description: Astra database to create the keyspace.

keyspace.description: Initial keyspace name. For additional keyspaces, use the astra_keyspace resource.

topicPartitions.description: Number of partitions in cdc topic.

databaseId.description: Astra database to create the keyspace.

keyspace.description: Initial keyspace name. For additional keyspaces, use the astra_keyspace resource.

topicPartitions.description: Number of partitions in cdc topic.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Cdc resources.

databaseId.description: Astra database to create the keyspace.

keyspace.description: Initial keyspace name. For additional keyspaces, use the astra_keyspace resource.

topicPartitions.description: Number of partitions in cdc topic.

cloudProvider.description: The cloud provider to launch the database. (Currently supported: aws, azure, gcp)

datacenters.description: Map of Datacenter IDs. The map key is "cloud_provider.region". Example: "GCP.us-east4".

keyspace.description: Initial keyspace name. For additional keyspaces, use the astra_keyspace resource.

regions.description:
Cloud regions to launch the database. (see https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra/docs/database-regions.html for supported
regions)

cloudProvider.description: The cloud provider to launch the database. (Currently supported: aws, azure, gcp)

keyspace.description: Initial keyspace name. For additional keyspaces, use the astra_keyspace resource.

name.description:
Keyspace name can have up to 48 alpha-numeric characters and contain underscores; only letters and numbers are supported
as the first character.

astra:index/privateLinkEndpoint:PrivateL.description:
`astra.PrivateLinkEndpoint` completes the creation of a private link endpoint by associating it with your endpoint.


## Import

# Amazon AWS example

```sh
 $ pulumi import astra:index/privateLinkEndpoint:PrivateLinkEndpoint example a6bc9c26-e7ce-424f-84c7-0a00afb12588/datacenter/a6bc9c26-e7ce-424f-84c7-0a00afb12588-1/endpoint/vpce-0f7aed6e7a18a1791
```

 # Google GCP example

```sh
 $ pulumi import astra:index/privateLinkEndpoint:PrivateLinkEndpoint example a6bc9c26-e7ce-424f-84c7-0a00afb12588/datacenter/a6bc9c26-e7ce-424f-84c7-0a00afb12588-1/endpoint/13585698993864708
```

 # Azure EKS example

```sh
 $ pulumi import astra:index/privateLinkEndpoint:PrivateLinkEndpoint example a6bc9c26-e7ce-424f-84c7-0a00afb12588/datacenter/a6bc9c26-e7ce-424f-84c7-0a00afb12588-1/endpoint/dc5ee5b1-4fc2-463e-a56b-ff54dd38b879/providers/Microsoft.Network/privateEndpoints/private-endpoint-example
```

astraEndpointId.description: Endpoint ID for referencing within Astra. May be different than the endpoint_id of this resource.

databaseId.description: The ID of the Astra database.

datacenterId.description: Astra datacenter in the region where the private link will be created.

endpointId.description: Endpoint created in your cloud provider account example: "vpce-svc-1148ea04af8675309"
